data.title: Morte Region Location and Map Guide
data.meta_description: Morte Region in Genshin Impact is the 4.2 Fontaine map expansion located east of the Belleau Region. See its location, how to unlock, map, and its areas here in this guide!
data.meta_site_name: Game8｜The Top Gaming and App Walkthroughs Straight from Japan!
data.text:
-

Morte Region in Genshin Impact is the 4.2 Fontaine map expansion located east of the Belleau Region. See its location, how to unlock, map, and its areas here in this guide!

Morte Region Location

East of Poisson

Morte Region is located east of the Belleau Region and directly south of Erinnyes.

Fontaine Map and Location

How to Unlock Morte Region

Have Access to Fontaine

To unlock Erinnyes Forest, you must first access the Nation of Fontaine itself. Once you've unlocked the Belleau Region, simply head eastwards and you'll arrive in the Morte Region.

Reach Morte Region On Foot

Alternatively, once you've got access to Fontaine, you can visit Morte Region on foot. Since it's not a barricaded island, you can swim directly from all directions to reach it!

Morte Region Areas and Notable Locations

Tower of Gestalt

The Tower of Gestalt is a giant tower located at the center of the ocean between the Mont Automnequi and Fort Charybdis. You can unlock and enter the Tower of Gestalt by playing through the In the Wake of Narcissus World Quest.

Tower of Gestalt Location Guide

East Slopes of Mont Automnequi

The East Slopes of Mont Automnequi reside in the Morte Region. This is where the Cupid's Lover quest takes place!

Fort Charybdis Ruins

Fort Charybdis Ruins is located on a giant mountain in the Morte Region. A lot of puzzles can be found in this area.

Morte Region Puzzles

Operable Mechanisms

You can find a series of Operable Mechanisms in the deserted area of Morte Region, all of which are part of Lord-Artificer Alain Guilotin's research!

Operable Mechanisms How to Solve

Morte Region Quests

Morte Region World Quests

In the Wake of Narcissus Quest Chain Search in the Algae Sea Savior's Wake Waking from the Great Dream Rowboat's Wake Search in the Algae Sea Quest Chain Muse's Mother Meteoric Lance Cupid's Lover Thalia and Melpomene Individual World Quests Wish-Fulfilling Treasure Hunt An Expected Lie

Morte Region Release Date

Released on November 8, 2023

Genshin Impact Version 4.2 Release Date November 8, 2023

Morte Region was released on November 8, 2023, at the same time as Version 4.2's patch update!

Version 4.2 Release Date and Banners
